participant_1.background:
As a banker, I start my day by eating a delicious steak breakfast before heading into the office.
My grandkids love to go to the park with me and we always have a great time running around and playing on the swings.
i love to cook for my family and friends.
I enjoy spending time with my mom as she is a great listener and always has good advice.
I just finished baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies for my family.

participant_2.background:
I am not wealthy, but I am comfortable.
i like to sew my own clothing.
i usually catch sunfish.
I will be enjoying my time off with my family and friends.
I keep my hair a dark brown, so it doesn't show the sweat from my workouts.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to?
I'm just finishing up some sewing projects. It's a lot of fun and I'm enjoying the process.
That's great! I love to sew too. I'm actually working on a new dress for myself right now.
Nice! What kind of dress is it?
It's a simple sundress with a floral print. I'm hoping it will be ready in time for the summer.
That sounds really cute! I'm sure it will be perfect for summer.
Thanks! I hope so too. What kind of projects are you working on?
I'm making some new pants and a shirt for myself. I'm also making some gifts for my family and friends.
That's awesome! I love making gifts for people. It's so much fun to see their reactions when they open them.
Me too! It's the best feeling when you see someone you love smile because of something you made for them.
I know right? It's the best feeling in the world.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a banker. I really enjoy my job and I get to help people every day.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great banker.
What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, bake, and spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds really fun! I love to cook too.
I know right? It's so much fun to create something delicious and share it with your loved ones
